comprehensive_overview: Numactl is a set of tools that allows you to have more control over NUMA (Non-Uniform Memory Access) systems. It provides utilities for memory placement and migration of processes and controlling the NUMA policy of a process.
core_features: The core features of numactl include setting the NUMA policy for a process, controlling memory placement and binding of processes to specific NUMA nodes, providing NUMA affinity control to specific CPUs, and migrating processes between NUMA nodes.
